entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump #COVID19 in the White House, 80,000 lives lost, yet you continue on with this dereliction of duty, dereliction of responsibility. Or are you just way out of your league....
